alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:20AM CST until February 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and Blowing Snow. Additional snow accumulations of a dusting to an inch with the highest totals toward the Highway 14 corridor. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa and southwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Brief and localized near blizzard conditions are possible near the Highway 14 corridor. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Quickly falling temperatures could result in flash freeze conditions on area roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cottonwood; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock
